Model¶

class countries.base.model.Country(name: str, code: str, population: int, translations: dict[str, str], timezones: list[str], independent: bool, area: int = None, capital: str = None, region: Region = None)¶

Represents a country.

class Region(value)¶

Represents regions.

  • AFRICA = “Africa”

  • AMERICAS = “Americas”

  • ANTARCTIC = “Antarctic”

  • ANTARCTIC_OCEAN = “Antarctic Ocean”

  • ASIA = “Asia”

  • EUROPE = “Europe”

  • OCEANIA = “Oceania”

  • POLAR = “Polar”

area: int = None¶

area of the country

capital: str = None¶

capital of the country

code: str¶

code of the country

independent: bool¶

whether the country is independent or not

name: str¶

name of the country

population: int¶

population of the country

region: Region = None¶

region of the country

timezones: list[str]¶

timezones of the country

translations: dict[str, str]¶

translations of the name
